query-mapping.description: The list of posts for the blog administrator.

query.name: blog-admin-post-list
query.comment: Get the list of blog posts
query.sql: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.uri, post.create_date, user.name FROM blog as blog INNER JOIN acl on acl.entity_id = blog.id and acl.entity_type = :table and acl.user_id = :user_id INNER JOIN blog_post AS post on blog.id = post.blog_id INNER JOIN user ON post.author_id = user.id WHERE blog.id = :blog_id
